speaker: MULDER
line: Two men, young, idealistic - the fine product of a generation hardened by world war. Two fathers whose paths would converge in a new battle - an invisible war between a silent enemy and a sleeping giant on a scale to dwarf all historical conflicts. A 50-years war, its killing fields lying in wait for the inevitable global holocaust.

speaker: MULDER
line: Theirs was the dawn of Armageddon. And while the world was unaware, unwitting spectators to the hurly-burly of the decades-long struggle between heaven and earth there were those who prepared for the end; fight, or bow to the will of a fearsome enemy. Or to surrender - to yield and collaborate. To save themselves and stay their enemy's hand. Men who believed that victory was the absence of defeat and survival the ultimate ideology... No matter what the sacrifice.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Shoot me now, before it's too late!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder?!

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Shoot!

speaker: MULDER
line: Who are you!

speaker: CDC BIOSUIT MAN
line: Get down! Get down!

speaker: MULDER
line: Who are you?!

speaker: CDC BIOSUIT MAN
line: Down! Down! On the floor!

speaker: MULDER
line: What's going on?!

speaker: CDC BIOSUIT MAN
line: Get on the ground! Get on the ground!

speaker: MULDER
line: Who are you?!

speaker: CDC BIOSUIT MAN
line: Drop down! Drop! Drop!

speaker: MULDER
line: Who are you?!

speaker: CDC BIOSUIT MAN
line: We're with the Centers for Disease Control. Remain calm and where you are for your own good. You're gonna be transported to a quarantine facility as soon as we can secure the environment.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Quarantine for what?

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: A contagion. A contagion of unknown origin.

speaker: MULDER
line: There must be some kind of mistake. I signed up for the aroma therapy treatment.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are we going to be able to talk to somebody who can tell us what this is all about?

speaker: MULDER
line: Where the hell do you think we are?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I think, based on our travel time probably Fort Marlene. High risk decontamination and quarantine.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: I'm going to beg for your understanding and forgiveness and offer my humblest apologies for the way this went down. I didn't have a lot of choices. I owe your neighbors apologies as well. It's going to be some time before they get back in the building. We're still acting on a CDC Level - Four quarantine protocol.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Based on what information?

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: That Cassandra Spender had contracted a highly contagious vectoring organism which produces a spontaneous cellular breakdown and combustion.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What?

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: She was and remains the only surviving victim of an unspecified medical experiment that killed seven doctors with violent and unexplained burning.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who called you?

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: Agent Spender.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where's Cassandra?

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: She's isolated... pending full and satisfactory medical evaluation.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Cassandra Spender was in a general hospital environment for days. We met with her, and yet on a whim you call in the third battalion. It's unjustified and highly suspicious as to motive.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully...

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: What motives are you suspecting?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Your isolation of Cassandra.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: She's Patient Zero.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No one is sick or infected here. I mean, I assume that based on you walking in here dressed to the nines offering apologies masquerading as explanations.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, I want to see Cassandra.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: I told you-- she's isolated.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes, and I am a medical doctor.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: Who is suspended indefinitely from her position at the FBI.

speaker: SCULLY
line: They've burned our clothes.

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey... I heard gray is the new black.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, this stinks, and not just because I think that woman is a... well, I think you know what I think that woman is.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. Actually, you hide your feelings very well.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Spender calling the Centers for Disease Control? Mulder, this is just somebody using their position to stage a hi-tech government kidnapping.

speaker: MULDER
line: Apparently not. I just spoke to AD Skinner. He was at the hospital when Cassandra went missing. He heard Spender make the phone call to the CDC.

speaker: SCULLY
line: But she wasn't sick, Mulder. I mean, the remarkable thing is she was well.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, then why did she come to my apartment demanding to be killed?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Because of everything that had been done to her-because of the tests, because of the medical experiments and the implant put in her neck - the same thing that was done to me. She just wants it to stop. And I'm telling you, they have taken her so that it can continue.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. It won't continue. It doesn't have to anymore. She knows what she is, Scully. That's why it's so dangerous for her to be alive. That's why she came to my apartment asking to be killed.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What is she?

speaker: MULDER
line: I think she's the one, Scully.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: I recovered all the medical records form the hospital. The doctors who examined her before she escaped are telling us Cassandra Spender may be the culmination of 25 years of this group's finest efforts.

speaker: ELDER 3
line: That's why the rebels struck. They were trying to kill her.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: They killed everyone but her. They struck to keep her alive - keep us from killing her.

speaker: FIRST ELDER
line: What do the rebels want?

speaker: ELDER 3
line: To destroy us. They know that when the aliens learn of Cassandra colonization will begin.

speaker: ELDER 4
line: We must destroy Cassandra.

speaker: CSM
line: No. Let colonization begin. We must turn over Cassandra. Save ourselves.

speaker: ELDER 4
line: Bill Mulder was against this. He said this would be our tragic mistake.

speaker: CSM
line: Bill Mulder sacrificed his only daughter because he knew this day would arrive. What choice have we... If you want to see your families survive? If we want to see those we sacrificed returned to us?

speaker: MULDER
line: Hello? Hello? Oh, oh, Ma'am. These shoes? They're, they're two sizes too small. I was wondering if I could get a...

speaker: MULDER
line: A pair that fit, maybe?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: I can't be seen with you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Marita?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: If they catch me with you, they'll kill me this time.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: The Smoking Man and... his group.

speaker: MULDER
line: What have they done to you?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: Tests. Terrible, terrible tests.

speaker: MULDER
line: Like the tests on Cassandra Spender?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: No. No, Cassandra Spender is part of a program that's been going on for 25 years. A hybrid program.

speaker: MULDER
line: Then what were the tests on you?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: I was infected with the alien virus - the black oil. My tests were on the vaccine against it... being developed in secret.

speaker: MULDER
line: In secret from the alien colonists. The hybrid program was in cooperation with the aliens but the conspirators never intended to succeed... to finish the work.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: They were buying time.

speaker: MULDER
line: To make a vaccine and build a weapon.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: But Cassandra Spender happened.

speaker: MULDER
line: She's the first, isn't she? She's the first successful alien/human hybrid.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: If she is... and the aliens learn a hybrid exists... colonization of the planet will begin. With no stopping it.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Jeffrey. Jeffrey. Jeffrey.

speaker: SPENDER
line: Mom... How are you feeling?

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Uh, fine. Why are they keeping me here?

speaker: SPENDER
line: I'm keeping you here because you're safe here.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Safe from who?

speaker: SPENDER
line: You know who. From my father.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: You can't keep me safe from him.

speaker: SPENDER
line: I can, Mom and I'm going to. There won't be any more tests on you.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: You don't understand. You don't understand about me.

speaker: SPENDER
line: I do. I understand everything now.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: You don't understand what will happen... what will happen to you if they find me out. You've got to let me go.

speaker: SPENDER
line: They'll just hurt you again, Mom.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Yes. You must let them. Or everyone dies. Everyone. Jeffrey... please... Jeffrey... Jeffrey! Jeffrey...

speaker: MULDER
line: The latest in home security.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Hey, you get through this, you got to come through me.

speaker: MULDER
line: I got a call from Scully. Said it was urgent.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'll ask you to hear me out before you launch any objection. Mulder, I asked them to pull up everything they could on Diana Fowley.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't have time for this.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, she's playing you for a fool.

speaker: MULDER
line: I know her, Scully. You don't.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You knew her. You don't anymore. I think we can prove that to you.

speaker: BYERS
line: She took a position in the FBI's foreign counter-terrorism unit in 1991. Seven years in Europe.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yet there isn't a single piece of information available on her activities in the FBI files.

speaker: MULDER
line: I hope you've got something more than that to indict her with.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Travel records pulled from airline manifests that had been purged from her FBI records. Extensive movement throughout Western Europe. Almost weekly trips to and from Tunisia.

speaker: MULDER
line: For the purpose of what?

speaker: LANGLY
line: That's what we couldn't figure until we took a flyer and we found this.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Mutual UFO network logs.

speaker: MULDER
line: MUFON.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Special Agent Diana Fowley of the FBI was visiting every European chapter collecting data on female abductees.

speaker: MULDER
line: So she's collecting data. Big deal.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Or hiding it.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, you're reaching.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, when I was abducted a chip was put in my neck. When I happened upon a MUFON group filled with women who'd had the same experience.

speaker: MULDER
line: So you're suggesting that Diana is monitoring these abductees? Monitoring these tests?

speaker: SCULLY
line: You tell me that Cassandra Spender is the critical test subject - the one who could prove everything. And yet, who is watching over her? Mulder, I can prove what you're saying or I can disprove it but not when Diana Fowley is keeping us from even seeing her. Mulder, ask yourself why there is no information whatsoever on Special Agent Diana Fowley. Why she would suddenly happen into your life when you are closer than ever to the truth. I mean, you... you ask me to trust no one and yet you trust her on simple faith.

speaker: MULDER
line: Because you've given me no reason here to do otherwise.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, then I can't help you anymore.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, you're making this personal.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Because it is personal, Mulder. Because without the FBI personal interest is all that I have. And if you take that away then there is no reason for me to continue.

speaker: MULDER
line: Diana? Diana?

speaker: MULDER
line: Sorry. Nobody home. What are you doing here?

speaker: CSM
line: The door was open. I came in.

speaker: MULDER
line: Interesting company you keep.

speaker: CSM
line: No more interesting than your apparent ah... lingerie fetish.

speaker: MULDER
line: You feeling smug, C.G.B.? Yeah, I know your name. I know your game and I got nothing to lose.

speaker: CSM
line: I remember looking over a gun barrel at you once before, Agent Mulder. You couldn't pull the trigger then. What makes you think you can do it now?

speaker: CSM
line: I came here looking for my son.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why?

speaker: CSM
line: Because he's betrayed me. He's chosen the wrong side. He's chosen to believe in your cause.

speaker: MULDER
line: That presumes my cause is wrong.

speaker: CSM
line: Oh, it is, Agent Mulder. It is.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm not the one using innocent people - innocent women - as lab rats, trying to create a hybrid - an alien/human hybrid - so that I might save my own sorry ass when they finally come knocking...

speaker: MULDER
line: You find that funny?

speaker: CSM
line: Your father was against it, too, back in '73. The lone dissenter. But he came to his senses. And gave up your sister, Samantha.

speaker: MULDER
line: He didn't give up my sister. He was forced to. You made him do it.

speaker: CSM
line: Oh, you're wrong, Agent Mulder. I can't tell you how wrong you are. How wrong you've always been. We had agreed to cooperate with the alien colonists. By a majority vote taken by the group your father and I worked for. A group that came together at the State Department on a project dating back to 1947, to Roswell.

speaker: CSM
line: The vote changed that, though. It changed everything. We no longer cleaved to any government agency. We would now work would ally ourselves with the alien colonists.

speaker: MULDER
line: Towards your own selfish end.

speaker: CSM
line: We forestalled an alien invasion.

speaker: MULDER
line: No, you only managed to postpone it.

speaker: CSM
line: We saved billions of lives.

speaker: MULDER
line: You put those lives on hold so you alone could survive.

speaker: CSM
line: No, Agent Mulder, so you could. That's exactly what your father failed to realize. He railed at us and our plans even as the process had begun. While the group had agreed to the most painful sacrifices. Sacrifices that... no one else would ever be asked to make.

speaker: MULDER
line: You gave them your children! You gave them your wife! You sent them away... like they were things.

speaker: CSM
line: We sent them away, Agent Mulder because it was the right thing to do.

speaker: MULDER
line: You sent them away to be tested on.

speaker: CSM
line: We sent them so they would come back to us.

speaker: CSM
line: Don't you see? You can't think these choices were made lightly. They were the most painful decisions of our lives. Watching our families' faces...

speaker: MULDER
line: You're a liar. My sister wasn't taken from any hangar. She was abducted from our home right in front of me.

speaker: CSM
line: Because your father was late to understand the necessity. That he, too, must give up one of his children to the alien colonists. The aliens insisted on it. It was the only way they would give us the one thing that we needed.

speaker: CSM
line: The one thing without which we could not proceed. You see, the alien fetus would give us the alien genome... the DNA with which we could make a human hybrid. A new race, Agent Mulder. An alien/human hybrid who could survive the holocaust. So you could survive. And live to see your sister.

speaker: MULDER
line: And now you've succeeded?

speaker: CSM
line: Quite... in spite of ourselves. The plan was to stall, to resist.

speaker: MULDER
line: To work secretly on a vaccine.

speaker: CSM
line: That was your father's idea. To use the alien DNA to make a vaccine. To save everyone. The world. It's the reason I come along. But it's too late now. Colonization is going to begin. There will be a sequence of events. A state of emergency will be declared because of a massive outbreak of the alien virus delivered by bees. And the takeover will begin. I have only to hand over Cassandra.

speaker: MULDER
line: You can't do that.

speaker: CSM
line: Our hand's been forced by the faceless rebels. We've no choice.

speaker: MULDER
line: Stop it now or I will stop it.

speaker: CSM
line: No, Agent Mulder. You won't stop it. Not if you want to see your sister again.

speaker: MULDER
line: You stop it... or everyone dies.

speaker: CSM
line: No. I live. You live... to see your sister return. It's what your father realized. It's just what you'll realize as your father's son. Or die in vain with the rest of the world.

speaker: CSM
line: Save her. Save yourself.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You're looking for your father. He's gone. They've all gone.

speaker: SPENDER
line: But they're coming back.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: No. No, they left for good.

speaker: SPENDER
line: What do you mean?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Well, they've abandoned these offices.

speaker: SPENDER
line: But they've been here for 50 years.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: I don't think you understand.

speaker: SPENDER
line: Where did they go?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: To West Virginia. They'll be transported by the colonists and begin medical preparations to receive the hybrid genes. Except for your father. He's gone to get your mother.

speaker: SPENDER
line: No one can get to her. I've got her secured away.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Secured away? He's already had his doctors looking at her.

speaker: SPENDER
line: I've got her under guard.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: She's probably being prepared as we speak, Jeffrey.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: What do you want now?

speaker: DOCTOR
line: Just lie back, Cassandra. We're just going to remove...

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: You leave me alone. Leave me alone!

speaker: DOCTOR
line: Cassandra. Lie back. Relax. It'll be easier.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Damn it. Help! Leave me alone! Oh, no, you're not going to dope me! No, don't dope me!

speaker: DOCTOR
line: Roll over, please. Roll over.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: No! No! Don't! Damn you! Bastards

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: . The biggest bastard of all.

speaker: CSM
line: I need a few minutes.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: They never question it do they?

speaker: CSM
line: What?

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: Your power and authority... When you're really such a coward.

speaker: CSM
line: I... I came in hopes that we might speak of the future... not the past.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: I'm at a disadvantage... since you've stolen the past from me.

speaker: CSM
line: I won't defend myself. Except... except to say that... We're here now only because of what I've done. It's due to it.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: I know it now. Only now. But for so many years, I didn't understand-- through all the abductions and the tests- that it was you.

speaker: CSM
line: I ordered them, yes. But it was never my intention to harm you.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: God.

speaker: CSM
line: It was to save you. And Jeffrey.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: You can never save our son. He knows what you've done to me.

speaker: CSM
line: I saved you.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: There's only one way... to save him. Only one thing you must do.

speaker: CSM
line: I can't do it to you. I can't.

speaker: CASSANDRA SPENDER
line: I must die or they all die. No! No.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: Geez.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to scare you.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: Fox, what are you doing?

speaker: MULDER
line: Nothing. Not a damn thing.

speaker: MULDER
line: I came here looking for evidence.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: What are you talking about?

speaker: MULDER
line: Evidence that you'd lied to me-- that you had loyalties other than to me or to the X-Files.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: Nothing could be further from the truth, Fox. Nothing.

speaker: MULDER
line: I didn't find anything Diana. But something found me.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: What?

speaker: MULDER
line: Fate. Destiny. Whatever it's called when you... when you realize the choices you thought you had in life were already made.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: Fox, what happened here?

speaker: MULDER
line: You were being paid a visit by young Jeffrey Spender's father. The Cigarette-Smoking Man came looking for his son who has now taken up the futile cause that used to be mine-- against his father.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: Why futile?

speaker: MULDER
line: Because there's nothing to be done. And at some point, you just have to accept that the only way those you love are going to survive is if you give up.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's where it all begins. That's where we need to be if we want to survive it.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: Please help me. They're going to leave me here.

speaker: SPENDER
line: Please stay away from me. I can't help you.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: They're packing everything up. They aren't coming back here. I know you. I can help you.

speaker: SPENDER
line: You can't help me.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: I know where they're taking her. I know how they're taking her. You've got to trust me, Jeffrey.

speaker: DOCTOR
line: Shut the door. This is a highly sensitive area. Get back. You're at high risk of contamination. Leave the room.

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey, Scully. It's me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, I was just dialing you. Where are you?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm with Diana.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm coming to get you.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. We're coming to get you. You're coming with us.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No, Mulder, listen to me. I'm going to take you to Cassandra.

speaker: MULDER
line: Cassandra's gone, Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I know, but I know where she's gone to, Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, it's no use.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, I'm going there whether you're coming or not.

speaker: MULDER
line: Going where?

speaker: SCULLY
line: To the Potomac yards. They're transporting her by train car.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who gave you this information?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Spender called me.

speaker: MULDER
line: All right. I'm going to send you on ahead.

speaker: DIANA FOWLEY
line: What is it? What did she say?

speaker: MULDER
line: This may be our last chance to stop them.

speaker: MULDER
line: Turn around. Turn around, Scully.

speaker: DOCTOR
line: What the hell is that?

speaker: MULDER
line: I think this is him.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You going to tell me what the hell is going on?

speaker: MULDER
line: Our lives are in danger. We don't have much time.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Why couldn't you tell me that over the phone?

speaker: MULDER
line: If somebody overheard us, it might create mass panic.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Mass panic over what?

speaker: MULDER
line: El Rico Air Base.

speaker: FIRST ELDER
line: We waited to send our communication.

speaker: ELDER 3
line: We were worried something had happened.

speaker: CSM
line: Shots were fired at us.

speaker: ELDER 3
line: By who?

speaker: CSM
line: I don't know.

speaker: CSM
line: We have people missing. Where's Alex Krycek?

speaker: SPENDER
line: Krycek! I'm trying to get out of here.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: What are you talking about?

speaker: SPENDER
line: We can't get past security. They won't recognize my authority to remove a patient.

speaker: SPENDER
line: My father did this to her. She wants to tell her story.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You sorry son of a bitch. You don't get it, do you? It's all going to hell. The rebels are going to win. They took it.

speaker: SPENDER
line: They took what?

speaker: ELDER 3
line: Who sent the communications?

speaker: ELDER 4
line: No one.

speaker: FIRSST ELDER
line: This isn't supposed to be.

speaker: ELDER 3
line: What is this?

speaker: FIRST ELDER
line: Get back. Back! Back! Back! Back! Get back. Back. Back.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: The way these people died... the loss of life here - it is beyond words. I can't imagine how it must be for you - losing your mother.

speaker: SPENDER
line: Yes, sir. But that's not why I asked for this meeting.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: Why did you ask for it?

speaker: SPENDER
line: Because I'm responsible for the deaths of those people at the Air Base hangar in no small way. I certainly didn't prevent them.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: I can assume then you can explain how they died? Because I have yet to hear any explanation.

speaker: SPENDER
line: Agent Mulder can explain it. I think Agent Scully, to an extent. They might have even prevented what you see in those photos.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: Agents Scully and Mulder have been suspended by the FBI.

speaker: SPENDER
line: Also my doing... and my mistake.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: I would ask...

speaker: SPENDER
line: I'd ask, sir - before you tell me that it's not my business - that you do everything you can to get them back on the X-Files. Far worse can happen... and it will.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: Where are you going?

speaker: SPENDER
line: To pack up my office.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: Agent Spender...

speaker: AD KERSH
line: You have answers now? Why didn't I hear about those answers before?

speaker: MULDER
line: I've had answers for years.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: Then why didn't we hear about them?

speaker: MULDER
line: No one would ever listen.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: Who burned those people?

speaker: MULDER
line: They burned themselves. With a choice made long ago by a conspiracy of men who thought they could sleep with the enemy. Only to awaken another enemy.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: What the hell does that mean?

speaker: MULDER
line: It means the future is here, and all bets are off.

speaker: AD KERSH
line: Agent Scully, make some sense.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sir, I wouldn't bet against him.

speaker: SPENDER
line: Get out of here.

speaker: CSM
line: This picture you have - I haven't seen it since you were born. You probably don't even know who the other man is.

speaker: SPENDER
line: I don't care. Get out.

speaker: CSM
line: It's Bill Mulder, Fox Mulder's father. Isn't that something. He was a good man... a friend of mine... who betrayed me in the end.

speaker: SPENDER
line: I know more than enough about your past... enough to hate you.

speaker: CSM
line: Your mother was right. I came here hoping otherwise. Hoping that my son... might live to honor me......like Bill Mulder's son.
